data.title: Tawau vs Yorkton, Sk Climate & Distance Between
data.text:
The distance between Tawau, Malaysia and Yorkton, Sk, Canada is approximately 12,751 km or 7,924 mi.

To reach Tawau in this distance one would set out from Yorkton, Sk bearing 314.7° or NW and follow the great circles arc to approach Tawau bearing 206.5&deg or SSW .

Tawau has a tropical rainforest climate (Af) whereas Yorkton, Sk has a warm summer continental/ hemiboreal climate with no dry season (Dfb).

Tawau is in or near the subtropical wet forest biome whereas Yorkton, Sk is in or near the boreal moist forest biome.

The average annual temperature is 25.2 °C (45.3°F) warmer.

Average monthly temperatures vary by 35.5 °C (63.9°F) less in Tawau. The continentality subtype is extremely hyperoceanic as opposed to truly continental.

Total annual precipitation averages 1327 mm (52.2 in) more which is equivalent to 1327 l/m² (32.57 US gal/ft²) or 13,270,000 l/ha (1,418,651 US gal/ac) more. About 4 as much.

The altitude of the sun at midday is overall 35.7° higher in Tawau than in Yorkton, Sk.
